text: The Soviet Union women's national under-18 and under-19 was the women's basketball side that represented the Soviet Union in international under-18 and under-19 competitions, until the dissolution of the Soviet Union in 1991. In 1992, CIS women's national under-18 and under-19 basketball team represented the Commonwealth of Independent States in international under-18 and under-19 competitions.
